fields.label: property
fields.name: Property
fields.description: Derived by grabbing the value of a property within an object.

fields.label: method
fields.name: Method
fields.description: Derived by a method within an object.

fields.label: dependent
fields.name: Dependent
fields.description: Dependent on another attribute that is derived (probably set as part of a single method that sets lots of attributes) - does not get derived itself, is created as part of the atttribute on which it depends - in Type, should set derived_from to the name of the attribute that causes this attribute to be populated.
